title: Josh McDaniels Returns To Pats, Spurns Colts, What's The Impact? (Football 02/07)
description:
Will Brinson and Jason La Canfora break down the crazy sequence that led to Josh McDaniels returning to the Patriots as an assistant, and spurning the Colts head coaching offer. The guys analyze the impact on all parties affected included, New England, Indy, McDaniels and his future, Belichick, Brady, Luck, other coaches and more!
